# The `math` Module

The [`math` module](https://docs.python.org/3/library/math.html) contains mathematical functions.

Constants such as PI:

```{python}
import math

math.pi
```

Floor or ceiling operations:

```{python}
math.floor(6.2)
```

```{python}
math.ceil(6.2)
```
